nodes.text: Capture of transports in the Pyros system

The Rebel Alliance captured four loaded transports in the Pyros system in 3 ABY. Minister of Finance Nower Jebel messaged Rebel Alliance Chancellor Mon Mothma following the action, complaining that even that victory would not make up for the loss of the ion cannon at the Battle of Hoth.
The communication was preserved in the archive The Rebel Files.
The capture is mentioned in the 2017 in-universe reference book Star Wars: The Rebel Files, written by Daniel Wallace.
